channel.title: Snapclerk on Skyclerk
channel.description: Recent content in Snapclerk on Skyclerk

item.title: What is Snap!Clerk?
item.description: Snap!Clerk is a feature of Skyclerk that organizes all of those receipts you acquire wherever your busy life takes you: the gas station, grocery store, airport, cafe, gym .

item.title: Uploading receipts via email
item.description: A convenient feature of Snap!Clerk is the ability to upload receipts via email. Simply attach a receipt image to an email and send it to a unique, secure email address linked to your Skyclerk account.
